posts.title: ntopng 安装使用
posts.text: centOS7 安装参考https://devops.profitbricks.com/tutorials/install-ntopng-network-traffic-monitoring-tool-on-centos-7/ 步骤Installing Ntopng1yum install epel-release 1vim /etc/yum.repos.d/ntop.repo Add the following content to the ntop.repo file: 123456789101112[ntop]name=ntop packagesbaseurl=http://www.nmon.net/centos-stable/$releasever/$basearch/enabled=1gpgcheck=1gpgkey=http://www.nmon.net/centos-stable/RPM-GPG-KEY-deri[ntop-noarch]name=ntop packagesbaseurl=http://www.nmon.net/centos-stable/$releasever/noarch/enabled=1gpgcheck=1gpgkey=http://www.nmon.net/centos-stable/RPM-GPG-KEY-deri 1yum -y update 1yum --enablerepo=epel install redis ntopng Start the Ntopng and Redis Service1yum --enablerepo=epel install hiredis-devel 12systemctl start redis.servicesystemctl enable redis.service 12systemctl start ntopng.servicesystemctl enable ntopng.service Configure NtopngNtop will create a default configuration file at /etc/ntopng/ntopng.confHowever if you check the status, you’ll see that ntop gives you a “No Pro licence is found” error, and announces that it will return to community mode after 10 minutes. To check the ntopng status, run1systemctl status ntopng remove this warning message by editing the ntopng configuration file:1vim /etc/ntopng/ntopng.conf Add/change the line shown below:12-G=/var/tmp/ntopng.pid\--community Save and exit the file, restart ntopng and check status again:12systemctl restart ntopngsystemctl status ntopng Allow Ntopng Through the Firewall123firewall-cmd --permanent --add-port=3000/tcpirewall-cmd --reload Test Ntopnghttp://your.server.ip:3000. Use the login information: User: admin Password: admin Enjoy… 编译安装参考：https://linux.cn/article-5664-1.html使用参考官网：http://www.ntop.org/products/traffic-analysis/ntop/

posts.title: Hexo 使用
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
